these are probably there because your

it meant that you only had this small

began to realize that by understanding
how the hardware
worked and they knew how their software
work that they could trick the hardware
into drawing
Graphics in the border and it's actually
quite a clever thing because it relies
on the fact that when you design
Hardware you want to do the simplest
Hardware implementation as possible so
that you don't have to use any more
transistors in the Silicon than you have
to so on Old CRTs you draw each line
separately one after the other across
the screen so on a p screen you've got
625 lines in an image but because of the
way video systems work you get two what
are called fields of about 312 lines
each so as far as your tire is concerned
each image that it shows is 50 of them a
second is 312 lines High the hardware
inside is counting each of those lines
every time it starts a new line the
hardware is counting it says the
hardware I'm at line whatever it is
start showing the
display and then it comes down to I'm at
line 200 and something stop showing the
display what people realized that this
is slightly different for the American
system these machines could work both in
the UK in the US and anywhere else in
the world if they switched it from being
a UK machine to a US machine at just the
right point in terms of the video
frequencies the hardware say well I'm a
UK machine so I don't have to do
anything here then a bit later on it
would say I'm a US machine I don't need
to stop the display here and it would
carry on displaying Graphics into the
border so so by some very very clever
programming switching things on and off
literally counting exactly how long each
instruction the CPU takes so that things
can be turned on and off in the hardware
exactly the right point they were able
to get Graphics into the whole display
there and it was really nice for a

everything that was going on and program
it so they hacked it to an extent yeah
they hacked it they not so much hacked
they pushed it beyond what the designers

what the designs had done and then
changed it and you saw this with other

for a demo like this but it's much

smoothly scroll the screen like you
